titleInfo.title: On-diagonal heat kernel bounds and volume growth on Riemannian manifolds

mods.abstract: We investigate heat kernel estimates of the form $p_{t}(x, x) ≥ c_{x}t^{−α}$, for large enough $t$, where $α$ and $c_{x}$ are positive reals and $c_{x}$ may depend on $x$, on manifolds having at least one end with a polynomial volume growth.
